Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text: 31 ll. on recto, verso pasted down. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Agreement between Gay son of Pamenh (Pamenes) and Panobchunis son of Tuot respecting a window in a wall between their two adjacent properties. Date. year 45 Mechir 15 of Ptol. Euergetes II = BC. 125 Mar. 7". Concerning this group of texts, see entry for P BM EA 10491.
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Text 10 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (C J Martin/S.E. Thomas).
Bibliographic references: Glanville 1939 / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum I: A Theban Archive of the Reign of Ptolemy I, Soter (p.46-8, pl.13) (Appendix I)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (45854) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/45854)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss, bleached Black ink Backed: brown paper displayed in Room 63 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
